description:
* Are you using limited data plan for your Palm mobile? Or do want to save some web page for reading next time.
    * Then this app for you.
    * By using this app you can easily save the web page for future reference.
    * This app will allow you to search the page depending upon web page title.
    * You can add customizable title for your saving web page.
    * Complete browser functionality implemented.
    * Use this app and save your money.
    * By using this app you can save any encrypted page. So you will save lot of time for again connecting to the website.
    * This app is suitable for all.


Note:
    In offline browsing you will get only plain text, images will not be displayed.
